title: Logging My Experiences in LoL - Recording # of AFK/Trolls over 100 Games
body:
So after a solid year of horrible, horrible experiences on the OCE server, I've decided to start a record of it for scienceness. I won't be naming or shaming anyone (here). I might well point out the positive players I experience though, which would be a good thing.

It'll be a mixture of new posts with particular details of certain games, and summaries in the original post.

Kicking it off - Game #1 - Twisted Treeline (3v3) - Normal :
Had an AFK - {{champion:157}} . He actually had the hide to request that I choose a different champ so he could have a knockup. Then, we join, he buys dorans blade and afk's in base. THE MOMENT THE GAME ENDS, and we're in the after game lobby, he starts talking. Couldn't believe it. Horrible Summoner.

# Of Games           Total AFK Players             Total Troll Players
        1                                  1                                        0

Any Estmates? I'm guessing approx. 20 full blown trolls and 30 AFKs. I'm currently climbing out of bronze so It may get slighty better until I hit S5 again.

WISH ME LUCK!

Ròb

replies.body:
A lot of times it's not their fault.

They bought a cheap bot, and it crashed. You can't expect them to break away from their own team to fix the bot on your team, that would against the summoners code.
Gues what silver is nothing better...

Seems you could use a little advice on editing post content. The line that says:
# Of Games Total AFK Players Total Troll Players
No doubt you wanted the "#" to show up. If it's put at the start of a line, like you've done, it'll actually change the font as you've probably noticed in both your own post and just above in mine. To get around that just use a backslash, like this: "\#", and it will show the "#" without changing font. (This wont be needed if it's in a table though) For example (hit that quote button if you want to see "behind the scenes"):
\# Of Games Total AFK Players Total Troll Players

As for your attempt at a table, there's actually a way to edit in tables on the boards (and again, hit that quote button to see how it works, this one's a bit more complicated), like this:

| # Of Games | Total AFK Players | Total Troll Players|
|:-----------:|:----------:|:------------:|
| 1 | 1 | 0 |

There is a Rioter post somewhere on the boards that explains this kind of stuff but I couldn't find it.
lol, that last example was weird, ty though
